revised_title: Two Timescale Harmonic Balance: Application to Autonomous One-Dimensional Nonlinear Oscillators
tldr: This article presents a two timescale harmonic balance method applied to autonomous one-dimensional nonlinear oscillators. The authors demonstrate the method's application to three autonomous equations, including the van der Pol equation, the modified van der Pol equation, and the van der Pol equation with escape. The study focuses on the stability of orbits and the effects of amplitude variations on mean oscillation and frequency.
